name: MC Stan
description: '''Altaf Sheikh''' (born 30 August 1999), known professionally as '''MC Stan''' (stylized as '''MC STÎ”N'''), is an Indian [[Rapping|rapper]], [[lyricist]], [[Record producer|music producer]], and [[composer]]. He is known for his work in the [[Music of India|Hindi hip-hop]] and [[trap music]] scene. In 2023, he won the [[reality television]] show ''[[Bigg Boss (Hindi season 16)|Bigg Boss 16]]''.
